title: With Malaysia Airlines Crash, A Loss For AIDS Research
teaser: A number of scientists and others members of the AIDS research community died in the downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 over Ukraine. NPR's Kelly McEvers speaks with journalist and editor in chief of HIV Plus magazine Diane Anderson-Minshall about the loss.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
